statement.p: Find the area of the quadrilateral shown. The lengths of the four sides (counterclockwise) are \displaystyle{a}={4.2} , \displaystyle{b}={5.9}, \displaystyle{c}={8.8}, and \displaystyle{d}={11.9}, with diagonal from first to third point \displaystyle{e}={7.7}. Measurements are in yards. What is the area of this figure?
